Difficulty Notes: Optimizing the number of resources obtained in X number of actions. Note, this tests the ability to get passive resource at the start and how to choose between them
Question: Assume this is the state before the upcoming round starts. What is the maximum guaranteed number of victory points the player could have after taking their first two actions? Assume all other players will pass immediately and that you go last in turn order. Output the answer as: Previous amount: <num>, New amount: <num>
Rationale: At the start of the round, player will gain one life from Druid, and can gain two more life from the vault collect ability. Action one, they can discard a card to gain two more life. Then, they will have 5x of life, elan, and calm and can claim coral castle for 3 more victory points.
